text: Willi Sippel (born 20 March 1929) is a German former footballer who played for 1. FC Nürnberg, Borussia Neunkirchen and the Saarland national team as a defender. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:1. FC Nürnberg players Category:Borussia Neunkirchen players Category:Association football defenders
title: Willi Sippel
